name: Random Duck
description: API for random duck images and HTTP status code ducks

about.overview: The Random Duck API provides access to a collection of duck images and GIFs, including unique images representing HTTP status codes, ideal for fun integrations and error pages.
features: Random duck image and GIF retrieval
Support for JSON metadata and direct image access
useCases: Enhancing error pages with themed duck images
Creating fun social media bots with duck content
Integrating random duck images into web applications

endpoints.description: Returns a random duck image or GIF
Returns a JSON object containing all available image and GIF filenames
Returns a duck image representing a specific HTTP status code

quickStart: Make a GET request to fetch duck images or metadata

authentication.description: No authentication required for API access
